corpses.description: The list of dead products, killed by Microsoft

slug.description: A human readable unique identifier for the item

name.description: The name and title of the item

subtitle.description: An optional subtitle for the item

birthDate.description: The date the item was released, or announced if release data is not feasible

deathDate.description: The date the item was finally discontinued

link.description: A link to a web page with more information about the item (this should not be the page which announces the item's death)
